availability.ab: The files of the collection are modifications of the corresponding text files from 'Liber Liber'(https://www.liberliber.it/online/), which are provided with a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 license. The collection, the added annotation and metadata are published under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 license.

sourceDesc.bibl: Comment by Liber Liber on their digital edition of the file: E' il primo racconto lungo di Verga, scritto nel 1886. 2015, , .
"Una peccatrice" di Giovanni Verga. Newton Compton Editori, 1995. 1995, 88-7983-927-6, .

encodingDesc.p: Letters or diary-paragraphs are encoded as div with @type="letter" @type="diary".
Headers, quotes and verse lines have been marked up. Chapter summaries following the header are marked as 'ab' with @type='abstract'.

revisionDesc.change: Encoding of the front-body-back-structure, the chapter-structure, lg, quotes and some metadata.
Added some meta-data and some minor corrections.
